long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Saver is a handy Chrome extension designed for efficient management of frequently used prompts or text snippets. Perfect for writers, marketers, or anyone who often reuses specific text prompts in their work.

Key Features:

- Save prompts with custom names for easy identification
- Quick search through all your saved prompts
- Expand/collapse functionality to view full prompt text
- One-click copy to clipboard
- Easy deletion of unnecessary prompts
- Clean, user-friendly interface

Prompt Saver streamlines your workflow by providing instant access to your commonly used text snippets, saving you time and ensuring consistency in your work. Whether you're crafting social media posts, responding to emails, or generating AI prompts, Prompt Saver keeps your go-to text at your fingertips.
